full_text: CITY OF NEW YORK DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH BUREAU OF RECORDS AND STATISTICS Borough of BROOKLYN New York, N. NOTICE: In issuing this transcript of the Record, the Depart- ment of Health of the City of New York does not certify to the truth of the statements made thereon, as no inquiry as to the facts has been provided by law.
